Name: hookwormsHighwaymen
Description: The original hookworms escaped Araxis after Grim Sybil was killed liberating the Argo. Silas Black created The Hookworms but were eventually hunted down and destroyed by a special Ops force from the Aurigan Coalition. Those that escaped are the remnants of the orginal band. And with new ‘recruits’ have formed a roving band to continue their harassing ways.
ReputationStatements: No matter how what comes at us we'll always 'worm' our way out of it.
MissionSuccessStatements: Yeah well, what did you expect?
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Don't try to 'worm' your way out of it. You only just covered the job.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Nothing get rid of 'worms' better than Combantrin. Out with you.
